bug.author: dmonopoly
bug.summary: tf.get_collection documentation: argument description is confusing
bug.description: From <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/get_collection>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/get_collection</denchmark-link> : "Items without a name attribute are never returned if a scope is supplied and the choice or re.match means that a scope without special tokens filters by prefix." What does this mean? Is there a typo here?

comments.comment: I think that's "of" rather than "or". Let me check internally.
Yes, that should be an "of", and we should probably also insert a comma before "and the choice" to make the structure clearer.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/dmonopoly>@dmonopoly</denchmark-link> would you care to send a PR?
Thanks! Make sure you put Fixes #9314 in the commit message & CC me on the PR.
I'll get to this later this week. Looking around for other fixes as well. Feel free to assign to me.
